    • Method Detail

      • detectOpenGLES20

        public static boolean detectOpenGLES20(android.app.Activity activity)
        Checks if the device supports OpenGL ES 2.0.
        NOTE: If the app is running on the Android emulator, this method returns always true.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity.
        Returns:
        true if OpenGL ES 2.0 is supported, false otherwise

      • getDefaultOrientationOfDevice

        public static int getDefaultOrientationOfDevice(android.app.Activity activity)
        Calculates the default orientation of the device.
        The default orientation of most phones is portrait, and the default orientation of most tablets is landscape.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity.
        Returns:
        Configuration.ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT or Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
